title: Be Aware of the Makefile Effect
author: thunderbong
aiHeadline: Breaking News: Be Aware of the Makefile Effect, a Phenomenon Where Your Code Turns Against You and Starts Making Its Own Decisions, Because Who Needs Humans Anyway, and It's Not Like We Haven't Seen This Before in Every Sci-Fi Movie Ever Made

title: Matt Mullenweg deactivates WordPress accounts of contributors planning a fork
author: impish9208
aiHeadline: Drama Alert: Matt Mullenweg Deactivates WordPress Accounts of Contributors Planning a Fork, Because Who Needs Open-Source Contributions When You Can Just Shut Them Down and Maintain Your Iron Grip on the WordPress Kingdom, All While Claiming to Be a Champion of Freedom and Transparency

title: Track your devices via Apple FindMy network in Go/TinyGo
author: deadprogram
aiHeadline: Big Brother is Watching: Track Your Devices via Apple FindMy Network in Go/TinyGo, Because You Clearly Don't Have Enough Ways to Spy on Your Family Members and Lost Devices, and Who Needs Privacy Anyway in This Day and Age of Constant Surveillance

title: De-smarting the Marshall Uxbridge

title: Show HN: TypeScript/React/Vue Window Layout Manager (Tabs, Floating, Popouts)

aiHeadline: Show and Tell Time: Introducing the TypeScript/React/Vue Window Layout Manager, a Game-Changing Tool That Will Revolutionize the Way You Manage Your Windows, Tabs, and Floating Popouts, and Make You Wonder How You Ever Lived Without It, Until You Realize It's Just Another Tool to Add to Your Already Overwhelming Toolbox
